Package edu.byu.ece.rapidSmith.bitstreamTools.bitstream

This package is used to represent a Xilinx FPGA bitstream file.

See:
          Description

Class Summary
Bitstream Represents a Xilinx bitstream.
BitstreamHeader This class contains all of the information in a configuration bitstream header.
BitstreamParser Parses an existing binary bitfile (.bit) and generates a Bitstream object.
BitstreamUtils Contains a number of static methods used within the bitstream creation and parsing process.
ConfigurationData abstract class meant to be the base class of anything that can produce configuration data (DummySyncData, Packet, and PacketList).
CRC Several cyclic redundancy checks are performed while the bitstream is being loaded.
DummySyncData Represents the dummy sync data found in Xilinx bitstreams.
Packet A bitstream is made up of packets.
PacketList A list of Packet objects.
PacketListCRC Extends the PacketList object by computing the CRC of packets that are created.
PacketUtils Contains a number of static Packet objects of commonly used packets and several static methods for creating useful packet lists.
 

Enum Summary
PacketOpcode In both type 1 and 2 packets, bits 28:27 of the header determine the opcode
Opcode 00: NOP
Opcode 01: Read
Opcode 10: Write
Opcode 11: Reserved
PacketType There are two packets types: One and Two.
RegisterType In a type 1 packet, the register is specified by bits 26:13, however only 17:13 are currently used, 26:18 are reserved
CRC Read/Write 00000 CRC register
FAR Read/Write 00001 Frame Address Register
FDRI Write 00010 Frame Data Register, Input (write configuration data)
FDRO Read 00011 Frame Data Register, Output register (read configuration data)
CMD Read/Write 00100 Command Register
CTL Read/Write 00101 Control Register
MASK Read/Write 00110 Masking Register for CTL
STAT Read 00111 Status Register
LOUT Write 01000 Legacy Output Register (DOUT for daisy chain)
COR Read/Write 01001 Configuration Option Register
MFWR Write 01010 Multiple Frame Write
CBC Write 01011 Initial CBC value register
IDCODE Read/Write 01100 Device ID register
AXSS Read/Write 01101 User bitstream access register
COR1 Read/Write 01110 Configuration Option Register 1
CSOB Write 01111 Used for daisy chain parallel interface
WBSTAR Read/Write 10000 Warm Boot Start Address Register
TIMER Read/Write 10001 Watchdog Timer Register
BOOTSTSRead/Write 10110 Watchdog Timer Register
CTL1 Read/Write 11000 Watchdog Timer Register
UNKNOWN0 Unknown 10011 This is an undocumented register in V5 bitstreams
 

Exception Summary
BitstreamException An exception that indicates an invalid Bitstream.
BitstreamParseException  
 

Package edu.byu.ece.rapidSmith.bitstreamTools.bitstream Description

This package is used to represent a Xilinx FPGA bitstream file. The details on how a bitstream is organized can be found in the following Xilinx documents:

  • Xilinx V4 COnfiguration Guide
This package does NOT represent the bitstream as it exists on the FPGA but rather how the bitstream is represented in a file and as it would be loaded into the FPGA. The purpose of this package is as follows:
  • Represent bitstream files in a data structure that has already parsed the bitstream in a useable manner
  • Provide support for creating new bitstreams by simplifying the process of creating bitstream packets.
  • Provide support for parsing the bitstream from a file (a variety of formats)
  • Provide support for writing out the bitstream in a variety of formats
